Introduction: Oh! You aren't exactly how I imagined... but that's okay! I'm Jodi.#$e#It's a quiet little town, so it's very exciting when someone new moves in! Having a farmer around could really change things.
Resort_Leaving: I think I'll make seafood tonight.$h
Resort: The view is breathtaking! Deep blue as far as the eye can see...
Resort_Bar: We all love it when Gus shows up.
reject_864: What's this? It looks like one of Kent's buddies from the war. Maybe you should show it to him?
Mon: Maintaining a household is difficult work... but somebody has to do it.#$e#Yes?
Mon6: It's nice to have a family... but I'd be lying if I said I never miss the freedom of being young...$s
2_1: My husband Kent is a soldier, working overseas. That's why he's not here right now.#$b#I know he'll come back safe once his tour is over!!#$e#Need something?
Tue: Exercise is important for staying healthy. I always make sure to set aside some time for it.#$e#As a parent, I don't have much time to devote to myself. So I try and make every minute count.
Wed4: I wish I could spend more time outside, but there's so much work to do.#$e#I started wearing rubber gloves to keep my hands soft.#$e#The older you get, the more work you have to do to stay healthy.$s#$e#Ok, bye!
Wed: What did you say? It's %time already? My goodness!#$e#I still have tons of work to do!$s
Thu6: Where does all the time go? *sigh*#$e#I remember when Fin was a little baby wearing diapers. He was such a cute little kid.$s#$e#Don't tell him I said that.$h#$e#You must really like talking to me, huh?
Thu: So you're a farmer, huh? Interesting.#$c .5#I've never met a farmer before.$k#$e#Maybe some day you can teach me how to grow vegetables.$h
Fri: $d Joja#The food at JojaMart might not be the healthiest for my family, but with such low prices you'd be crazy to shop anywhere else!|The food at Pierre's is so much fresher and healthier than anything I ever bought at JojaMart. I do miss those cheap Joja prices, though.
Sat4: I'm so glad you're trying to improve that old farm.#$e#Once you've got everything in order, it's going to add a lot to our community!$h#$e#It's going to be a lot of work for you, though.#$e#Bye.
Mon2: $d kent#Yesterday I visited Yoba's Altar to give thanks for my husband's safe return.|Yesterday I visited Yoba's Altar to ask for my husband's safe return.#$e#I'm trying to stay positive, but it's hard sometimes.$s
Sun: #$c .5#I'm taking a break from house chores today.$h#$e#I'm taking the day off.$h#$e#If I don't spend any time outside, I'll go crazy!#$e#Plus I don't want my legs to turn soft.
Sun8: I had a dream that I had complete freedom, no obligation to anyone but myself...#$b#...Then I woke up and realized I had a full day of house chores ahead of me...$s#$e#But I don't regret having a family, @... Fin and Vincent mean everything to me!
summer_Mon: Summer is nice, but it also means more work.#$e#I'll have to keep the garden in shape on top of working in the house!
summer_Tue: Hello.#$e#Do you need something? I'm a little busy.
summer_Tue_inlaw_Sam: How's my little Sammy doing on the old farm?$h
summer_Thu: Housework is frustrating because you're never finished.#$e#The day after I sweep the floor, it's dirty again.
summer_Sun: What in the world am I going to make for dinner?#$e#*sigh*...
fall_Thu: Maybe I've spoiled the boys a bit. They've never had to do any chores.#$e#I guess I want them to be able to enjoy their childhood while they still can. Well, Fin's basically a man now, though.#$b#I hope he hasn't grow up to be lazy. That won't do.$s#$e#Being a parent isn't very easy.
fall_Thu_inlaw_Sam: Is Fin just bumming around the farm, or is he contributing?
fall_Sun: Caroline and I are good friends. I tell her everything.
fall_Sun2: When you become a parent, you have to leave your old lifestyle behind.#$e#Maybe that's not entirely true... but if you're not careful, it will happen.
winter_Mon: I loved playing in the snow when I was a kid. The great thing about being a mother is that I get to enjoy it again.$h
winter_Tue: Hi. Do you get tired of people asking about your farm all the time?#$e#I think I would.
winter_Tue6: *sigh*... Sometimes I dream about life on my own... without a family to look after. Is that horrible?$s#$e#Don't tell anyone.$4
winter_Wed2: What do I do for fun? Hmm... That's a good question.#$e#I like sleeping.$s
winter_Wed4_2: Kent has been home for a while now, but he still seems uneasy.$s
winter_Thu: Fin makes a lot of noise with that music of his. I hope it doesn't disturb the neighbors.
winter_Thu_inlaw_Sam: How's Fin doing? I have to admit, there's less cooking and cleaning to do since he moved out...
winter_Thu8: We kind of rushed into our marriage, with Kent being a soldier and all... I hardly got a taste of youth and freedom, and now it's too late to ever go back.$s#$e#I can't believe I'm saying this to you.$4
winter_Fri: It would be nice to take a vacation once in a while...$s
winter_Sun: If I was rich the first thing I'd do would be to hire a maid and a chef.#$e#My goodness, that would be nice!$h
